jump_scares.spoiler: Loud music begins playing as a girl tries to sleep
A chandelier falls from the ceiling
Something appears to fly off the heater in the corner of the room, causing a woman to scream
Joseph bangs on the table during a quiet scene
There is a high pitched noise and the camera falls to the ground
A popping champagne cork in a quiet scene may startle some viewers
There is a loud crash from a neighboring room
Jane lunges at Chrissy
Harry, with a torch shining on his face, appears at the window in an attempt to scare Brian
Harry slowly enters Jane’s room and sees her standing in the corner covered in blood
Jane bends backwards and a stream of blood comes out of her mouth
There is a high pitched static sound and the camera wobbles violently
An unseen force pulls Joseph into the closet
Chrissy receives a shock as she walks past some electrical equipment
The lights spark and the power goes out in the house
There are several loud bangs on the door
There is a loud crash
Chrissy bumps into Brian
Jane’s arm suddenly ignites as she goes to pick up Evie. [Video
A demonic claw suddenly appears behind Chrissy as she struggles to get air from underneath the door
Chrissy is pulled into the air by an invisible force
A flame ignites Jane
A demonic face flies out of the flames at the camera
